properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from High Island to Freeport TX out 20 NM; Coastal waters from Freeport to Matagorda Ship Channel TX out 20 NM; Waters from Freeport to Matagorda Ship Channel TX from 20 to 60 NM; Waters from High Island to Freeport TX from 20 to 60 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 3 at 9:36AM CST until February 4 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Houston/Galveston TX
properties.description:
* WHAT...South winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 35 kt and seas
6 to 10 feet.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Freeport to Matagorda Ship Channel
TX out 20 NM, Coastal waters from High Island to Freeport TX
out 20 NM, Waters from Freeport to Matagorda Ship Channel TX
from 20 to 60 NM and Waters from High Island to Freeport TX
from 20 to 60 NM.

* WHEN...Until 3 PM CST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM CST TUESDAY
